about_the_game:
Welcome to the Temple!

Why do children play hopscotch, what do they hide and who’s watching after the Temple of Children? This is a story about children, their games and their Great God.

"Where do the sounds come from? And colors? What comes into the child's mind when they first see something red? We hardly ever think about these things. We don't even wonder why the sky is blue and the grass is green. We don't play games that much anymore, although we used to do it before to explore the world. All of us were children. And all of us have forgotten something.
I didn't sleep well that night. I had nightmares."

———

Plot


“You can hear the hollow sound of rushing blood in the Hall. Some small figures looking as children were playing hopscotch. Despite the absurdity of the surroundings, Nastya felt calm. This whole place seemed miraculously familiar."

You are going to take a trip into the world of fear and discover a secret which is seriously hidden by the children. Moreover, you are going to try walking in children's shoes and overcome the challenges, doing this is beyond the ability of any adult. However, you will be able to tackle all the obstacles until you remember that you are just kids that have only become grown-ups.

———

Features


  • Deep atmosphere and intriguing plot inspired by boogeyman stories, urban legends, creepypastas and best horror writers
  • Set in Russian province of 2000s
  • Unique hand-drawn 2D art style and stop-motion animation
  • 3 chapters full of creepy surroundings and personas
  • Explore locations, solve riddles and puzzles
  • Hide from a pursuing monster
  • The secret will be revealed only in the end

name: The Temple of Children

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: i3 7100 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: The Temple of Children is a story-driven horror adventure about a simple little girl from a Russian province. Against her will she became part of horrible events, watching her reality turn into hell. To survive she needs to unravel the secret that children are hiding.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Portuguese - Brazil, Vietnamese, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese, Dutch, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
